com.ga.postsapi.service

Class PostServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ga.postsapi.service.PostServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PostService

    @Service
public class PostServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PostService
    Author:
    Mohammad Javed and Carlos Kruger

      • PostServiceImpl

        public PostServiceImpl()

    • Method Detail

      • createPost

        public Post createPost(Post post,
                       java.lang.String token)
                throws TokenException

        createPost is method with two params Post, Token(String) and Post return type. It will validate token from User-API service and get the User Object or null. And then set the userId of Post and save into database.

        Specified by:
        createPost in interface PostService
        Throws:
        TokenException

      • deletePost

        public java.lang.Long deletePost(java.lang.Long postId,
                                 java.lang.String token)
                          throws TokenException,
                                 UnauthorizeActionException,
                                 PostNotExistException

        deletePost is a method with postId(long) and Token(String) and Long return type. This method validate token from User-API and matches userId from User and userId from Post and then delete Comments of that post by calling deleteCommentsOfPost.

        Specified by:
        deletePost in interface PostService
        Throws:
        TokenException
        UnauthorizeActionException
        PostNotExistException

      • postList

        public java.util.List<Post> postList()

        postList is a method that will return all Posts exist into the database. And also collect Users of the Posts from the User-API and attached to related Posts.

        Specified by:
        postList in interface PostService
        Parameters:
        void - No parameter is passed
        Returns:
        a list of posts will be returned

      • getPostById

        public Post getPostById(java.lang.Long postId)

        getPostById is a method that will return the specific Post by postId and also all the Comments liked to that specific Post. Comments are collected from Comments-API by sending the postId.

        Specified by:
        getPostById in interface PostService
        Parameters:
        postId - The type is long
        Returns:
        a Post that owns postId

      • getPostsByUser

        public java.util.List<Post> getPostsByUser(java.lang.String token)
                                    throws TokenException

        getPostByUser is a method that will return the specific Post by user and also all the Comments liked to that specific Post. Comments are collected from Comments-API by sending the token.

        Specified by:
        getPostsByUser in interface PostService
        Parameters:
        token - The type is String
        Returns:
        a list of the Posts created by the user that owns the token
        Throws:
        TokenException
